title: Puumaya's World
name: Puumaya's World
description:
A Map by Puumaya

These are the places I've been. I hope you enjoy the stories and pictures that are associated with eac.

properties.name: Bloukrans River Bridge
properties.description: Posted by PuumayaSite of the world\'s highest bungee jump from a fixed position. Survived in 1998.

properties.name: Dallas, Texas, 75229
properties.description: Posted by Puumaya4123 Shady Hill Dr, Dallas, Texas, 75229Where I Grew Up

properties.name: Diare, Ghana
properties.description: Posted by PuumayaWhere I Served as a Peace Corps Volunteer

properties.name: Dogon Country, Mali
properties.description: Posted by PuumayaBeutiful civilization located along the base and somtimes the wall of an escarpment. Trekked in July 2002.

properties.name: Duke University
properties.description: Posted by PuumayaUndergraduate School, 1996-2000

properties.name: Homa Bay, Kenya
properties.description: Posted by PuumayaSummer Research Site, 2006

properties.name: Houston, Texas
properties.description: Posted by PuumayaWhere my brother, his wife and son William live.

properties.name: Kenya-Rwanda Border
properties.description: Posted by PuumayaMost beautiful border crossing encountered to date.

properties.name: Kibale National Park
properties.description: Posted by Puumaya Chimpanzee Sanctuary. Saw first wild chimpanzee in January 2003.

properties.name: Kisumu, Kenya
properties.description: Posted by PuumayaSummer Research Site 2006

properties.name: Lalibela, Ethiopia
properties.description: Posted by PuumayaLocation of Ethiopia\'s historic rock-hewn churches. Amazed in December 2002.

properties.name: Lusaka, Zambia Sept. 2007
properties.description: Posted by PuumayaPATH International MACEPA project and the beginning of my next adventure in Africa.

properties.name: Makuya
properties.description: Posted by PuumayaMakuya Tribal area where I worked with Tshulu Trust on developing a community health club project.

properties.name: Mt. Kilimanjaro
properties.description: Posted by PuumayaKibo Peak. Climbed August 2006

properties.name: Murchison Falls National Park
properties.description: Posted by Puumaya Where the Nile River passes through the eye of a needle. Visited New Years 2003.

properties.name: Rollins School of Public Health
properties.description: Posted by Puumaya  1518 Clifton Road, Atlanta, GA, 30322Masters Degree Program, 2005-2007

properties.name: Shamrock Farm/Umfuleme
properties.description: Posted by Puumaya This is the farm where I currently live while working on the IWRM project in Umzimkhulu.

properties.name: Simon's Town
properties.description: Posted by PuumayaWhere I currently live and work with AfricaAHEAD.

properties.name: Sossusvlei
properties.description: Posted by PuumayaThe heart of the Namib Desert with some of the largest sand dunes in the world.

properties.name: The Mouth of the Nile
